# scm_lldp_profile (Resource)

LldpProfile resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "scm_lldp_profile" "example" {
  folder = "All"
  mode   = "transmit-receive"
  name   = "lldp-profile-tf-1"
  option_tlvs = {
    management_address = {
      enabled = true
    }
    port_description    = true
    system_capabilities = true
    system_description  = false
    system_name         = true
  }
  snmp_syslog_notification = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) LLDP profile name

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `mode` (String) LLDP mode
- `option_tlvs` (Attributes) Option tlvs (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--option_tlvs))
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `snmp_syslog_notification` (Boolean) SNMP syslog notification

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--option_tlvs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `option_tlvs`

Optional:

- `management_address` (Attributes) Management address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--option_tlvs--management_address))
- `port_description` (Boolean) Option TLV Port Description
- `system_capabilities` (Boolean) Option TLV System Capabilities
- `system_description` (Boolean) Option TLV System Description
- `system_name` (Boolean) Option TLV System Name

<a id="nestedatt--option_tlvs--management_address"></a>
### Nested Schema for `option_tlvs.management_address`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Management address enabled
- `iplist` (Attributes List) Iplist (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--option_tlvs--management_address--iplist))

<a id="nestedatt--option_tlvs--management_address--iplist"></a>
### Nested Schema for `option_tlvs.management_address.iplist`

Optional:

- `interface` (String) Interface
- `ipv4` (String) IPv4 Address
- `ipv6` (String) IPv6 Address
- `name` (String) Name


## Import

The following command can be used to import a resource not managed by Terraform:

```bash
terraform import scm_lldp_profile.example folder:::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_lldp_profile.example :snippet::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_lldp_profile.example ::device:id
```

**Note:** Please provide just one of folder, snippet, or device for the import command.
